channel.title: Authors on Deeproot
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Deeproot

item.title: Dan Banda
item.description: Dan is a passionate software engineering intern from Bandarawala, Sri Lanka. He loves exploring system design, coding best practices, and thinking deeply about software architecture.

item.title: Harish
item.description: Harish is a software engineering enthusiast from Colombo, Sri Lanka, with a keen interest in coding best practices, architecture, and solving complex engineering challenges.

item.title: Harsha
item.description: Harsha is a software enthusiast from Negambo, Sri Lanka, interested in deep technical learning, coding, and developing practical engineering skills.

item.title: Jamzi
item.description: Jamzi is a motivated intern from Kalmunai, Sri Lanka, passionate about understanding software architecture and applying first-principles thinking in projects.

item.title: Manodya
item.description: Manodya is an aspiring software engineer from Weerakettiya, Sri Lanka, passionate about coding, first-principles thinking, and understanding complex systems.

item.title: Nethsarani
item.description: Nethsarani is a dedicated software intern from Walasmulla, Sri Lanka, with a strong interest in system design, software architecture, and problem-solving techniques.

item.title: Sam Sen
item.description: Sam is an enthusiastic learner from Kegalle, Sri Lanka, focused on software fundamentals, clean code, and applying engineering principles in practical projects.

item.title: Sankalpana
item.description: Sankalpana is a motivated software intern from Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka, focused on building strong fundamentals and exploring real-world software engineering practices.

item.title: Sri Shanker
item.description: Sri Shanker is an aspiring software engineer from Jaffna, Sri Lanka, interested in deep technical problem solving and building a strong foundation in system design.
